Name: The Vine & The Fig Tree
Ingredients: 30 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions:
DRY SHAKE (without ice) all ingredients and strain back into shaker. SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Special ingredient #1 : Fig and sage syrup
Pour 1 litre water into a pan with 2 packets (100g each pack) of dried figs and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat, add 1.4kg sugar and stir to make a syrup. Take off heat and add two stems worth of sage leaves. Leave to stew and stir occasionally. Once cooled, strain off the figs and leaves and bottle. Store in a refrigerator prior to use.
History: Created in 2016 by Ciarán Russell at The Tippling House, Aberdeen for Jack Daniel’s Tennessee Calling competition.
Nutrition: One serving of The Vine & The Fig Tree contains 137 calories
Garnish: Sage leaves, dehydrated fig slice & lemon zest twist
